# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Curve3D_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Curve3D)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
Curve3DPluginInfo.C
Curve3DCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
Curve3DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
Curve3DMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtCurve3DFileFormat.C
avtCurve3DOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
Curve3DEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtCurve3DFileFormat.C
avtCurve3DWriter.C
avtCurve3DOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ICurve3DDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ICurve3DDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ICurve3DDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MCurve3DDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MCurve3DDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MCurve3DDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MCurve3DDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ECurve3DDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ECurve3DDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ECurve3DDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ECurve3DDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ECurve3DDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ECurve3DDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ECurve3DDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ECurve3DDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Curve3D ${INSTALLTARGETS})
